mapper.sql: id, scene_id, current_page, times, background, bgColor, is_example, is_del
mapper.insert:

id,
scene_id,
current_page,
times,
background,
bgColor,
is_example,

content,

mapper.update:
update scene_page
times = #{times,jdbcType=DATE},
background = #{background,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bgColor = #{bgcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_example = #{isExample,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND current_page = #{currentPage,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update scene_page set scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_page = #{currentPage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, times = #{times,jdbcType=DATE}, background = #{background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bgColor = #{bgcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_example = #{isExample,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update scene_page set scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_page = #{currentPage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, times = #{times,jdbcType=DATE}, background = #{background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bgColor = #{bgcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_example = #{isExample,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scene_page where scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND current_page = #{currentPage,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
,
FROM scene_page WHERE scene_id=#{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_del=1 ORDER BY current_page ASC
